trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_SEQ_00<tab>Hihiyaja can point you in the direction of work.

TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_SEQ_01<tab>According to Hihiyaja, Wowobaru of the Coffer & Coffin seeks to create a new fish dish. If you would assist this culinary endeavor, collect four slices of fatty orobon and donate them to Wowobaru.
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_SEQ_02<tab>You procure an ample supply of fatty orobon slices in the usual fashion. Make a gift of them to Wowobaru at the Coffer & Coffin.

TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_SEQ_03<tab>Upon seeing your largesse of fatty fish, Wowobaru is struck by inspiration and immediately invents a new dish. He thanks you profusely for sparing him a costly process. Here in the heart of Thanalan, it would seem that fish are worth their weight in gold.
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_TODO_01<tab>Offer the fatty orobon to Wowobaru.
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_HIHIYAJA_000_1<tab>An idle adventurer is a sorry sight. I've no need of assistance at the moment, but perhaps someone at the Coffer & Coffin wants for a helping hand.

TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_HIHIYAJA_000_2<tab>Wowobaru, the resident chef, comes to mind. The man is obsessed with inventing new dishes, and I hear his current fascination is fish. If you were to donate some for his cause, I'm sure he'd be grateful.

TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_HIHIYAJA_000_3<tab>Now, I'm a simple farmer and don't know much about fish. But I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> know what I like, and I like orobon. You won't find a more succulent fish in these parts, I tell you.
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_HIHIYAJA_000_4<tab>If you have a mind to give some fish to Wowobaru, I can wholeheartedly recommend fatty orobon. Four slices or so should be enough for him to experiment with.
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_WOWOBARU_000_10<tab>Fish, fish...futile! There are no suitable species! But I shall not surrender...
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_WOWOBARU_000_11<tab>Orobon! Of course! But wait...how did you know of my epicurean endeavor?
TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_WOWOBARU_000_12<tab>Well, it matters not. The solution you suggest is sensational. Sauté with salt, a squirt of sun lemon...so simple yet sublime!

TEXT_SUBWIL068_00322_WOWOBARU_000_13<tab>Fish is a costly commodity here in Thanalan. Were it not for your local largesse, I would have been forced to fork out a fortune to have some brought hither. Thank you!
